message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to let it go for $180.
Alice, I appreciate your offer, but $180 is a bit higher than I'm willing to go.  I'm interested in the product, but I can only offer $130 for it right now.
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. I can offer it to you for $155.
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $155 is still a bit too high for me. I'm happy to meet you closer to the middle ground. I'm willing to pay $140 for the product.
I understand you're trying to get the best deal, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to make a profit. I can offer it to you for $145, and that's as low as I can go.
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate further. While $145 is closer, I'm still a bit over my budget.  I'm willing to go up to $142, but that's my final offer.

I'm not willing to go any lower than my previous offer. I think $145 is a fair price for this product. I'm not willing to accept $142, but I'll give you one last chance to meet me at $145. If not, I'll have to consider other options.
